name: Pledgethegap
body:
###pledge the gap

If Donald Trump succeeds in enacting his tax plans, millions of well-off Americans will find themselves with some extra money in their refund checks -- money coming straight from the social services and public programs Trump pledges to shut down.

If you donâ€™t think the answer is cutting up the social safety net, then pledge your Trump Tax Refund back to the communities that will suffer.
